title: Chicken skewers

default: You'll need 4 wooden skewers, soaked in water for ten minutes before using

steps: Place the chicken in a small bowl and add the soy sauce, orange zest and olive oil. Leave aside for five minutes to marinate.
Thread each chicken mini-fillet onto a skewer. Heat a griddle pan and fry the chicken skewers for three minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Serve immediately.
